jnxMbgPgwChargingMib.name: jnxMbgPgwChargingMib

revisions.description: CGF group and CGF tables index keys has changed to gateway id and profile id. Gateway id and gateway name has added to all the traps.
GGSN/PGW Charging global statistics table has added.

jnxMbgPgwChargingMib.contactinfo: Juniper Technical Assistance Center Juniper Networks, Inc. 1194 N. Mathilda Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089 E-mail: support@juniper.net
jnxMbgPgwChargingMib.description: This is Juniper Networks implementation of Mobility Charging MIB for PGW (Packet Data Networks Gateway ) in 3GPP LTE network and the Gateway GPRS Support Node (GGSN) in the 3GPP 3G Network.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfGroupsStatsTable.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfGroupsStatsTable
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfGroupsStatsTable.description: A table listing the stats for all (Charging Gateway Function) CGF Groups configured on the PGW.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfStatsTable.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfStatsTable
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfStatsTable.description: A table listing the statistics for all CGF configured on the PGW.

jnxMbgPgwCgLpsStatsTable.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLpsStatsTable
jnxMbgPgwCgLpsStatsTable.description: A table listing the stats for all Local persistent storage stats configured on the PGW.

jnxMbgPgwCgTspStatsTable.name: jnxMbgPgwCgTspStatsTable
jnxMbgPgwCgTspStatsTable.description: A table listing the stats for all (Charging Gateway Function) CGF Groups configured on the PGW.

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerStatsTable.name: jnxMbgPgwCgPeerStatsTable
jnxMbgPgwCgPeerStatsTable.description: A table listing the statistics for all CGF configured on the PGW.

jnxMbgPgwCgGlobalStatsTable.name: jnxMbgPgwCgGlobalStatsTable
jnxMbgPgwCgGlobalStatsTable.description: A table listing the charging global statistics of the PGW.

jnxMbgPgwCgFilesOnLcStorage.name: jnxMbgPgwCgFilesOnLcStorage
jnxMbgPgwCgFilesOnLcStorage.description: The number of Files containing Charging Data Records (CDRs) present on the Local Storage Device.Incremented when a file containing CDRs is closed on the Local storage device Decremented when sftp is done and a file is removed from the Local storage device

jnxMbgPgwCgLcStorageAvailSpace.description: The space available on the Local Storage Device in MB.

jnxMbgPgwCgLpsStatsEntry.description: A conceptual row listing the statistics for each LPS configured on the PGW.

jnxMbgPgwCgLpsFilesOnLcStorage.description: The number of Files containing Charging Data Records (CDRs) present on the Local Storage Device.Incremented when a file containing CDRs is closed on the Local storage device Decremented when sftp is done and a file is removed from the Local storage device

jnxMbgPgwCgLpsStorageAvailSpace.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLpsStorageAvailSpace
jnxMbgPgwCgLpsStorageAvailSpace.description: The space available on the Local Storage Device in MB.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfNodeAliveRespRx.description: Total number of Node Alive Responses received from the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfRedirectReqRx.description: Total number of Redirect Requests received from the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfRedirectRespTx.description: Total number of Redirect Responses transmitted to the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTReqTx.description: Total number of Data Record Transfer Requests transmitted to the CGF Server.This includes the retransmission counts also.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTSuccRespRx.description: Total number of Data Record Transfer Responses indicating success received from the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTErrRespRx.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTErrRespRx
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTErrRespRx.description: Total number of Data Record Transfer Responses indicating error received from the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfCdrTx.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfCdrTx

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMean.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMean
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMean.description: Mean Round Trip Time of the Data Record Transfer Request and Response to and from the CGF Server in seconds. This is calculated from the average of the minimum and maximum round trip times of the Data Record Transfer Request. This is applicable for CGF Servers which are connected via UDP protocol.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMin.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMin
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMin.description: Minimum Round Trip Time of the Data Record Transfer Request and Response to and from the CGF Server in seconds. This is applicable for CGF Servers which are connected via UDP protocol.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMax.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMax
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfDRTRTTMax.description: Maximum Round Trip Time of the Data Record Transfer Request and Response to and from the CGF Server in seconds.This is applicable for CGF Servers which are connected via UDP protocol.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfTransToDownState.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfTransToDownState
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfTransToDownState.description: Total number of transitions of the CGF Server to the DOWN state.

jnxMbgPgwCgCgfContainers.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCgfContainers
jnxMbgPgwCgCgfContainers.description: Total number of closed containers to the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerIndex.description: A number representing each CGF Server whose statistics is being generated.

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerVerUnsuppRx.description: Total number of Version Unsupported messages received from the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerNodeAliveReqRx.description: Total number of Node Alive Requests received from the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerRedirectRespTx.description: Total number of Redirect Responses transmitted to the CGF Server.

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerDRTReqTx.description: Total number of Data Record Transfer Requests transmitted to the CGF Server.This includes the retransmission counts also.

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerProfileName.description: A string that uniquely identifies the CGF Peer Profile.

jnxMbgPgwCgGlobalStatsEntry.description: A conceptual row listing the statistics for each PGW charging global statistics.

jnxMbgPgwCgCdrSendErrors.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCdrSendErrors
jnxMbgPgwCgCdrSendErrors.description: Total number of CDR send errors to charging module

jnxMbgPgwCgCdrEncodeErrors.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCdrEncodeErrors
jnxMbgPgwCgCdrEncodeErrors.description: Total number of CDR (charging data record) encoding errors.

jnxMbgPgwCgCdrAllocFailures.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCdrAllocFailures
jnxMbgPgwCgCdrAllocFailures.description: Total number of CDR memory allocation failures.

jnxMbgPgwCgServerName.name: jnxMbgPgwCgServerName
jnxMbgPgwCgServerName.description: A string that uniquely identifies the CGF server name.

jnxMbgPgwCgServicePicName.name: jnxMbgPgwCgServicePicName
jnxMbgPgwCgServicePicName.description: This identifies the session-pic, in the form ms-a/b/0, where <a> is the slot and <b> could be either 0 or 1.

jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDest.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDest
jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDest.description: This indicates any transisitions in the state of the CGF. Value 1 indicates one of the CGF for the Group came up. Redirecting CDRs to the Active CGF. Value 2 indicates last active CGF for the Group went down. CDRs being written to backup Local storage device. Value 3 indicates last active CGF for the Group went down. Backup Local storage device not configured.

jnxMbgPgwCgTSPName.name: jnxMbgPgwCgTSPName
jnxMbgPgwCgTSPName.description: A string that uniquely identifies the Transport Profile.

jnxMbgPgwCgMemLimit.name: jnxMbgPgwCgMemLimit
jnxMbgPgwCgMemLimit.description: This indicates any transisitions in the state of the CGF. Value 1 indicates System has reached Level 1 critical memory threshold. Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled, please ftp the charging records immediately. If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the charging records can be stored in local persistent storage. Risk - No new sessions will be allowed. Value 2 indicates System reaching Level 1 critical memory threshold condition has been resolved. Value 3 indicates System has reached Level 2 critical memory threshold. Action - Check the CGF server connections. If local storage is enabled, please ftp the charging records immediately. If local storage is not enabled, please enable it so the charging records can be stored in local persistent storage. Risk - New and existing sessions will be not be allowed. Value 4 indicates System reaching Level 2 critical memory threshold condition has been resolved.

jnxMbgPgwCgLcsSpace.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLcsSpace
jnxMbgPgwCgLcsSpace.description: Water marking for the local storage levels in charged of RE.

jnxMbgPgwCgLcsUtil.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLcsUtil
jnxMbgPgwCgLcsUtil.description: The percentage of the total of Local Storage Space by one the Charged on RE

jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus.name: jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus
jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus.description: Value 1 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is present. Value 2 indicates that the Alarm for a particular condition is absent.

jnxMbgPgwCgProfileName.name: jnxMbgPgwCgProfileName
jnxMbgPgwCgProfileName.description: A string that identifies a charging profile .

jnxMbgPgwCgPrevMMState.name: jnxMbgPgwCgPrevMMState
jnxMbgPgwCgPrevMMState.description: A string that indicates the maintenance-mode state .

jnxMbgPgwCgNewMMState.name: jnxMbgPgwCgNewMMState
jnxMbgPgwCgNewMMState.description: A string that indicates the maintenance-mode state .

jnxMbgPgwCgTProfileName.name: jnxMbgPgwCgTProfileName
jnxMbgPgwCgTProfileName.description: A string that identifies a charging profile .

jnxMbgPgwCgTPrevMMState.name: jnxMbgPgwCgTPrevMMState
jnxMbgPgwCgTPrevMMState.description: A string that indicates the maintenance-mode state .

jnxMbgPgwCgTNewMMState.name: jnxMbgPgwCgTNewMMState
jnxMbgPgwCgTNewMMState.description: A string that indicates the maintenance-mode state .

jnxMbgPgwCgPeerProfName.name: jnxMbgPgwCgPeerProfName
jnxMbgPgwCgPeerProfName.description: A string that uniquely identifies the CGF Profile.

jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWUpNotif.name: jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWUpNotif
jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWUpNotif.description: This notification signifies that the specified server has been marked alive. The ServerName identifies the server and the SPIdentfier identifies the session-pic which originated this notification.

jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWDownNotif.name: jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWDownNotif
jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWDownNotif.description: This notification signifies that the specified server has been marked dead. The ServerName identifies the server and the SPIdentfier identifies the session-pic which originated this notification.

jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDestNotif.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDestNotif
jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDestNotif.description: This signifies change in the destination of the CDRs (Charging Data Record)

jnxMbgPgwCgMemThresNotif.name: jnxMbgPgwCgMemThresNotif
jnxMbgPgwCgMemThresNotif.description: This signifies the internal memory unavalability in the system.

jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresNotif.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresNotif
jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresNotif.description: This signifies the memory unavailability in the local storage in the system.

jnxMbgPgwCgServiceUpNotif.name: jnxMbgPgwCgServiceUpNotif
jnxMbgPgwCgServiceUpNotif.description: This signifies the Charging daemon is UP on the SP.

jnxMbgPgwCgMMStateChange.name: jnxMbgPgwCgMMStateChange
jnxMbgPgwCgMMStateChange.description: This indicates that the given charging profile underwent a change in the maintenance-mode.

jnxMbgPgwCgTMMStateChange.name: jnxMbgPgwCgTMMStateChange
jnxMbgPgwCgTMMStateChange.description: This indicates that the given transport profile underwent a change in the maintenance-mode.

jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWUpNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWUpNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWUpNotify.description: This notification signifies that the specified server has been marked alive. The ServerName identifies the server and the SPIdentfier identifies the session-pic which originated this notification.

jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWDownNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWDownNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgGtpGWDownNotify.description: This notification signifies that the specified server has been marked dead. The ServerName identifies the server and the SPIdentfier identifies the session-pic which originated this notification.

jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDestNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDestNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgCDRDestNotify.description: This signifies change in the destination of the CDRs (Charging Data Record)

jnxMbgPgwCgServiceUpNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgServiceUpNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgServiceUpNotify.description: This signifies the Charging daemon is UP on the SP.

jnxMbgPgwCgMMStateChangeNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgMMStateChangeNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgMMStateChangeNotify.description: This indicates that the given charging profile underwent a change in the maintenance-mode.

jnxMbgPgwCgTMMStateChangeNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgTMMStateChangeNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgTMMStateChangeNotify.description: This indicates that the given transport profile underwent a change in the maintenance-mode.

jnxMbgPgwCgMemHighThresNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgMemHighThresNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgMemHighThresNotify.description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of inernal memory space for charging records. This alarm is sent outwhen the utilization exceeds or falls below configured high threshold value. Thealarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

jnxMbgPgwCgMemMediumThresNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgMemMediumThresNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgMemMediumThresNotify.description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of inernal memory space for charging records. This alarm is sent outwhen the utilization exceeds or falls below configured medium threshold value. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

jnxMbgPgwCgMemLowThresNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgMemLowThresNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgMemLowThresNotify.description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of inernal memory space for charging records. This alarm is sent outwhen the utilization exceeds or falls below configured low threshold value. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresHighNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresHighNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresHighNotify.description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of local storage space for charging records. This alarm is sent out when the utilization exceeds or falls below configured high threshold of available disk space. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresMediumNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresMediumNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresMediumNotify.description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of local storage space for charging records. This alarm is sent out when the utilization exceeds or falls below configured medium threshold of available disk space. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.

jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresLowNotify.name: jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresLowNotify
jnxMbgPgwCgLcsThresLowNotify.description: This trap indicates the alarm status on the node associated with the utilization of local storage space for charging records. This alarm is sent out when the utilization exceeds or falls below configured low threshold of available disk space. The alarm status (Active/Clear)is indicated by the jnxMbgPgwCgAlarmStatus variable.
